title: Nefarious Times for America | Guest: Steve Deace | 12/29/20
description:
Steve Deace fills in for Glenn and immediately gets on his soapbox about the outlandish things you also need to believe if you believe that the presidential election was legitimate. He also explains how the predictions he made in his book "A Nefarious Plot" have come to fruition all throughout 2020 and how its sequel, the recently released short book "A Nefarious Carol," paints a disturbing picture for a choice we may all have to make in the near future. Some messages that Steve wants everyone to understand are that love and truth are not mutually exclusive and that men might be the problem in our country, but they are also the solution.
